quotes.quote: If you can react the same way to winning and losing, that's a big accomplishment.
Knowledge may give weight, but accomplishments give lustre, and many more people see than weigh.
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try.
You can have meaning, accomplishment, engagement and good relationships, even if you are dull on the positive affect side.
The great accomplishments of man have resulted from the transmission of ideas of enthusiasm.
Every big accomplishment is a series of little accomplishments.
Your ability to set goals and to make plans for their accomplishment is the master skill of success.
To accomplish a difficult task one must first make it easy.
The supreme accomplishment is to blur the line between work and play.
There shall be wings! If the accomplishment be not for me, it's for some other.
It's a great sense of accomplishment when you can take something and really think it's really tough, and then all of a sudden you conquer it. That makes you feel pretty good.
Heat is required to forge anything. Every great accomplishment is the story of a flaming heart.
Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity.
A sense of accomplishment comes when you have completed the tasks for the goals you have set for yourself.
Blessedness consists in the accomplishment of our desires, and in our having only regular desires.
It doesn't matter how great your shoes are if you don't accomplish anything in them.
My most important professional accomplishment to date is the ability to keep working with absolutely no skills whatsoever.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
Nothing builds self-esteem and self-confidence like accomplishment.
We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
Arriving at one goal is the starting point to another.
An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
The bigger the challenge, the bigger the sense of accomplishment when you get to the end of it.
Every time you acquire a new interest, even more, a new accomplishment, you increase your power of life.
No matter how short or long your journey to your accomplishment is, if you don't begin you can't get there. Beginning is difficult, but unavoidable!
If you want to accomplish the goals of your life, you have to begin with the spirit.
A man's accomplishments in life are the cumulative effect of his attention to detail.
Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
All men are prepared to accomplish the incredible if their ideals are threatened
High moral character is not a precondition for great moral accomplishments.
It is amazing what you can accomplish if you do not care who gets the credit.
Your greatest accomplishment may not be something you do but someone you raise.
The greatest feeling of accomplishment for me is the fact that I was an athlete who was somewhat disabled.
It is through accomplishment that man makes his contribution and contribution is life's greatest reward.
Accomplishment is socially judged by ill defined criteria so that one has to rely on others to find out how one is doing
To accomplish great things, we must dream as well as act.
The greatest accomplishment is not in never failing, but in rising again after you fall.
Today's accomplishments were yesterday's impossibilities.
There exists a sacred strength for every great accomplishment.
Being varied is something I do instinctively and naturally. I feel a tremendous sense of accomplishment.
It's no use saying, "We are doing our best." You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
A great accomplishment shouldn't be the end of the road, just the starting point for the next leap forward.
A great accomplishment shouldn't be the end of the road, just the starting point for the next leap forward.
Every worthwhile accomplishment, big or little, has its stages of drudgery and triumph: a beginning, a struggle, and a victory.
You measure the size of the accomplishment by the obstacles you have to overcome to reach your goals.
In wilderness I sense the miracle of life, and behind it our scientific accomplishments fade to trivia.
Great accomplishments start with great aspirations.
The intelligent man is one who has successfully fulfilled many accomplishments, and is yet willing to learn more.
It is perhaps life's greatest accomplishment to live to old age, maintaining one's wits, one's sense of humor, one's health, and one's charm.
